instruction: Given a suitable input, generate a poem that captures the emotion of happiness.
output:
The bright warm sun
It fills me with life and fun
Seeds of joy in my heart does sown
A marvelous serenity is shown
A blossoming of love for me to own
This blissful feeling just can't be flown
Happiness that forever I'll be graced with 
A warmth that I can ever now relish.
